data.eml:eml: Taxonomic review of the lepida - group of Fannia R. - D. (Diptera: Fanniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Dong, Wang, Jing, Wang, Ming-Fu, Li, Kai (2011): Taxonomic review of the lepida - group of Fannia R. - D. (Diptera: Fanniidae). Zootaxa 2803: 57-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206692
